snippet.title: Blood Bowl 3 - Official Season 5 Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet the Necromantic Horror faction coming to Blood Bowl 3 when Season 5 kicks off on June 11, 2024. Watch the latest Blood Bowl 3 trailer to see this terrifying faction in action, as well as the reveal that crossplay is coming to the tactical turn-based fantasy football game on PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S on June 11, 2024. Blood Bowl 3 is available now on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One.

#IGN #Gaming
